translations: 再加倍；把……再折叠；循著……折回

sentences.sentence: The leading banks are expected to redouble their efforts to keep the value of the dollar down.
sentences.translation: 人们预计各大银行会加倍努力以保持美元的低价位。

sentences.sentence: Redouble your efforts and not slacken off.
sentences.translation: 要再接再励， 不能松劲。

sentences.sentence: There isn't much time ahead, so we should redouble our effort.
sentences.translation: 来日无多， 须加倍努力。
